articles.title: Israel says it has recovered the bodies of 2 hostages from the Gaza Strip - AP News
articles.description: Israel has recovered the bodies of two Israeli-American hostages taken in Hamas’ Oct. 7, 2023, attack that ignited the war in the Gaza Strip. Israeli strikes overnight and into Thursday meanwhile killed at least 13 people, including three local journalists wh…
articles.content:
TEL AVIV, Israel (AP) Israel has recovered the bodies of two Israeli-American hostages taken in Hamas Oct. 7, 2023, attack that ignited the war in the Gaza Strip.

articles.title: Exclusive | Kimberly-Clark Nears Roughly $3.5 Billion Sale of International Tissue Business - WSJ
